description:
Since its inception in early 2005 YouTube has gone from strength to strength in terms of delivering video content to its audience

  • Over 1 Billion Users
  • 300 hours of video are uploaded every minute
  • Half of youtTube views are on mobile devices
  • More than 1 Million Advertisers are using the YouTube platform
  • YouTube is localised in 75 countries and available in 61 languages

With that said this video training course will take you step by step through the process of setting up your own YouTube Channel. It covers the following lessons:

  • Introduction to YouTube
  • Setting Up Your YouTube Account
  • Your Dashboard Overview
  • Uploading Your Video
  • Basic Video Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
  • Advanced YouTube Tactic
  • Bonus Training

Once you have set up your own YouTube channel you will be able to deliver quality video content to your niche targeted audience

This will enable you to build a following of viewers who will in turn share you content via the YouTube like system with their friends and followers

If you are any of the following to name but a few:

  • Business Owner
  • Internet Marketer
  • Undiscovered Artist

You will find that having a YouTube Channel is great way to build your Brand / Business via the power of social media
title: Beginners YouTube Academy
